text:
For the last couple of months, cohort 3 (3pm London time on Fridays) of the C Study Group has just been me and <@U01DZUA88S1>, so we’ve decided to cancel the remaining sessions of that and join with cohort 1 (8pm London time on Tuesdays).

If anyone originally signed up to cohort 3 wishes to rejoin, you’re very welcome to either join cohort 1 or, if the timing works for you, the newly reformed cohort 2, which only started in May, and meets at 11am AEST (Sydney) on the last Thursday of the month. That cohort is being run by <@U06CZAJ6A86>, so please get in touch with him for more details if interested in that.

As ever, full details at <https://contributor.r-project.org/events/c-study-group-2025/>

attachments.fallback: C Study Group for R Contributors 2025
attachments.text: Study group from February to July 2025 designed for R contributors to develop skills in C programming.
